item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Aditya Hegde, an emerging applied statistician from India, passionate about technology, machine learning, and probability theory. In my evolving career as a data professional, I’ve uncovered some remarkable insights and valuable lessons. Through this blog, I aim to share my ongoing learnings and explore the data-driven world around me. Beyond data, I’m a proud cohabitant of a home that includes two delightful cats, an avid recreational cyclist, mechanical keyboard builder, and a coffee enthusiast.

item.title: Monty Hall banega Crorepati - Part 1
item.description: Application Of Probability Theory to a popular game show
